org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.core.builder

Class RouteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.core.builder.RouteHelper

  • public class RouteHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for creating IPF extensions in Java-based route definitions.
    Author:
    Martin Krasser

      • enricher

        public Enricher enricher(org.apache.camel.processor.aggregate.AggregationStrategy aggregationStrategy,
                         String resourceUri)
                  throws Exception
        Creates a new Enricher.
        Parameters:
        aggregationStrategy - aggregation strategy to combine input data and additional data.
        resourceUri - URI of resource endpoint for obtaining additional data.
        Returns:
        an enricher.
        Throws:
        Exception - if a producer cannot be created for the endpoint represented by resourceUri.

      • enricher

        public Enricher enricher(String aggregatorBeanName,
                         String resourceUri)
                  throws Exception
        Creates a new Enricher using an AggregatorAdapter that adapts an Aggregator Spring bean identified by name aggregatorBeanName. The adapter is configured to obtain the enrichment data from the resource's response-message's body (i.e. from the out-message's body of the exchange used to communicate with the resource).
        Parameters:
        aggregatorBeanName - name of the Aggregator bean.
        resourceUri - URI of resource endpoint for obtaining additional data.
        Returns:
        an enricher.
        Throws:
        Exception - if a producer cannot be created for the endpoint represented by resourceUri.

      • validation

        public Validation validation(String validatorUri)
                      throws Exception
        Creates a Validation process object.
        Parameters:
        validatorUri - URI of the endpoint that validates an exchange.
        Returns:
        a validation process object.
        Throws:
        Exception - if a producer cannot be created for the endpoint represented by validatorUri.

      • validation

        Parameters:
        validator - processor that validates an exchange.
        Returns:
        a validation process object.
